translation.en: What's up, people?
Welcome to The Marlon Way.
I'm Marlon.
Good news!
We just hit six million subscribers!
translation.es: ¡Acabamos de llegar a seis millones de subscriptores!

translation.en: I woke up this morning at 5:15 a.m.,
translation.es: Esta mañana me desperté a las 5:15 a. m.

translation.en: and I thought to myself, "Why am I up so early?"
translation.es: Pensé: "¿Por qué estoy despierto tan temprano?".

translation.en: But more importantly, "Why am I the only one up this early?"
translation.es: Pero más importante aún: ¿por qué soy el único que está despierto?

translation.en: So I decided to drive over to my ex-wife Ashley's house,
translation.es: Así que decidí ir hasta la casa de mi exesposa, Ashley,

translation.en: to invite her and the kids to join me.
translation.es: para que ella y los niños me acompañen.

translation.en: Ashley! [screaming]
Marlon, get out!
[cow bell ringing] [Marlon] Marley!
Why are you my dad?
[Marlon] Surprise!
Marley, Zack! What the...
[Zack] Hey, Mom.
Check out the fort. Do you like it?
It's... it's amazing.
It was Dad's idea.
Pretty cool, huh?
It's super cool.
And you used my expensive sheets.
You wanna see inside, Mom?
I would love to. Thank you.
-Hold up. -Hold up.
[both] What's the password?
[Zack] Here's the hint.
What do Dad and I love more than anything in the world?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que papá y yo amamos más que nada en el mundo?

translation.en: Farts.
-Oh, she's good! -She knows us so well!
That's a good guess, but that's not it.
translation.es: Fue un buen intento, pero no es esa.

translation.en: What's the one thing in the world that the kids and I cannot live without?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo único sin lo que los niños y yo no podemos vivir?

translation.en: Wait. Marley's in there?
I'm in the library. Can you please keep it down?
translation.es: Estoy en la biblioteca. ¿Puedes bajar la voz, por favor?

translation.en: Come on, Ash. Guess the password.
-I don't know the password. -[Marlon] Come on.
And I have to put these groceries down. [Marlon grunting]
translation.es: Y tengo que guardar estas compras.

translation.en: All right. Hey.
You fortify the ceiling in the rumpus room.
translation.es: Refuerza el techo del cuarto de juegos.

translation.en: And don't use the toilet yet, okay?
translation.es: Y no uses el baño aún, ¿está bien?

translation.en: -[Ashley] Marlon? -[Marlon] Hey.
Why is it that the really big, disruptive projects
translation.es: ¿Por qué los grandes proyectos revoltosos ocurren

translation.en: always happen at my house?
Well, for one thing, I only got one set of sheets.
translation.es: Bueno, en primer lugar, solo tengo un juego de sábanas.

translation.en: You don't want to use those.
[Marlon] Here, hold this.
Now, I want you to smile. Act like you like it.
translation.es: Ahora, sonríe. Actúa como si te gustara.

translation.en: -One, two, three, say, "cheese." -Cheese!
-Okay. -Okay, so...
What did we just sell?
We just sold Paco's Alcohol-Free Tequila.
translation.es: Vendimos tequila sin alcohol marca Paco.

translation.en: -Alcohol-free booze? -Yeah.
-What's the point? -Yeah, I know, right?
translation.es: - Eso no tiene sentido. - Lo sé.

translation.en: I like making bad decisions.
All I know is they're paying me to heighten the awareness to the brand.
translation.es: Solo sé que me pagan por publicitar la marca.

translation.en: So, are you going to stay for dinner?
Let me see.
Stay here and have a nice home-cooked meal with you and the kids,
translation.es: Quedarme a una linda cena casera con mi familia,

translation.en: or go home and listen to Stevie tell me the scientific reasons
translation.es: o ir a casa, escuchar a Stevie hablar sobre las razones científicas

translation.en: why The Walking Dead could never happen?
translation.es: por las que no existiría The Walking Dead.

translation.en: Yeah, I think I'll stay here.
translation.es: Sí, creo que me quedaré aquí.

translation.en: [Ashley] All right.
Did you talk to Marley about our meeting with Miss Frye?
translation.es: ¿Hablaste con Marley sobre la reunión con la señorita Frye?

translation.en: You said never to parent when you are not in the room.
translation.es: Dijiste que nunca haga el rol del padre si no estás.

translation.en: -Marlon? -Huh?
Where's the coffee maker?
It's in the fort.
We're opening a Starbucks behind the recliner.
translation.es: Abriremos un Starbucks detrás del sillón.

translation.en: Hey, make your mama a non-fat mocha latte with Frappuccino!
translation.es: Oye, hazle un mocha latte descremado con frappuchino a tu madre.

translation.en: Extra Stevia, please, and almond milk.
translation.es: Con stevia extra, por favor, y leche de almendras.

translation.en: Ash, this fort is gonna be lit.
There's gonna be a VIP section, we're gonna have a DJ,
translation.es: Tendremos una sección vip, un disyóquey

translation.en: we are gonna get a bouncer
to keep out all the gold-digging psychos that can't get liquor.
translation.es: para evitar locas caza fortunas que buscan famosos.

translation.en: Looks like we're gonna need that bouncer a lot quicker than I thought.
translation.es: Parece que debemos conseguirlo antes de lo que pensé.

translation.en: -Marlon. -Yvette.
I thought you divorced him.
He's here more now than when you were married.
translation.es: Viene más seguido que cuando estaban juntos.

translation.en: [Marlon] Oh, this should be good. Marriage advice,
from a girl whose longest relationship was All-Star weekend.
translation.es: de una chica cuya relación más larga duró un fin de semana.

translation.en: See. [chuckles]
-That was the old Yvette. -Mm?
I have a long-term boyfriend now,
and his name is God.
I hope he got some penicillin.
-Um, excuse me, I'm celibate. -[Marlon] Yeah?
Yeah, well, you "sell-a-bit" of that to somebody else.
translation.es: Bueno, véndele ese cuento a otro.

translation.en: [Ashley] Hey, hey, hey!
Come on, now. Yvette, did you bring the shoes?
-Girl, you know I brought the shoes. -[Ashley] Yes!
Hold on. No, wait, wait. What's with the shoes? [Yvette] Oh.
Ashley's got plans tomorrow night.
translation.es: Ashley tiene planes mañana en la noche.

translation.en: Uh-uh. No. [clears throat]
Ashley, I made family plans tomorrow night.
translation.es: Ashley, hice planes familiares para mañana en la noche.

translation.en: I got me, you, and the kids tickets to see the new horror movie Slaughter Camp.
translation.es: Nos compré entradas para Slaughter Camp, una película nueva de terror.

translation.en: Oh, well, Marlon, I wish you would've told me sooner.
translation.es: Bueno, Marlon, ojalá me lo hubieras dicho antes.

translation.en: I have plans tomorrow night.
-Well, cancel them. -She can't cancel them.
translation.es: - Bueno, cancélalos. - Ella no puede hacer eso.

translation.en: She's right, Marlon.
Come on. What plans you all got? What you all gonna do?
translation.es: Vamos. ¿Qué planes tienen? ¿Qué van a hacer?

translation.en: Stand outside of a club watching all the 21-year-olds get in
translation.es: ¿Estar en la puerta de una discoteca y ver entrar a los jóvenes,

translation.en: while you all sit there, ashy, eating street meat?
translation.es: sentadas tristes y comiendo comida rápida?

translation.en: Is that more important than spending quality time with your family?
translation.es: ¿Eso es más importante que pasar tiempo con tu familia?

translation.en: [Zack] Dad!
I used the fort toilet.
Oh, son!
Come on, that is your momma's Crock-Pot!
translation.es: Esa es una olla de tu madre.

translation.en: See?
That proves that you need a night out.
Yeah, but he made family plans to see Slaughter Camp.
translation.es: Sí, pero él tiene planes para ir al cine en familia.

translation.en: It ain't always about Marlon.
translation.es: No siempre se trata de Marlon.

translation.en: Girl, you're the one who ended this marriage.
Why are you acting like you're still married?
Well, you know, maybe if you ever get married
translation.es: Bueno, quizá entiendas cuando algún día te casas

translation.en: and have children one day, you'd understand.
So, now, you're throwing shade?
God ain't ready for that just yet.
translation.es: Dios no está listo para eso aún.

translation.en: What's up, people?
You know, what goes great with spaghetti?
translation.es: ¿Saben qué combina bien con las pastas?

translation.en: Paco's Alcohol-Free Tequila, and the babies love it, too.
translation.es: Tequila sin alcohol marca Paco. Y los niños también la aman.

translation.en: Ain't that right, son?
Thanks for the margarita, Dad.
Marlon, you cannot post a video of a child drinking a margarita.
translation.es: Marlon, no puedes publicar un video de un niño bebiendo una margarita.

translation.en: You can if it's alcohol-free.
Drink up, son.
-Choke, choke, choke! -[Ashley] Okay!
-Turn up! Turn up! Turn up! -Okay, stop, stop!
Okay! I think it's time we put our phones away.
translation.es: Bien, creo que es hora de guardar nuestros teléfonos.

translation.en: Daddy and I need to talk to you.
Oh, Marley's in trouble!
This is new. [chuckles]
No one is in trouble, Zack. Okay?
Marley, we sat with your counselor today.
translation.es: Marley, hablamos con tu consejera hoy.

translation.en: She said that you seem a bit withdrawn,
translation.es: Dijo que pareces un poco distraída

translation.en: and we just wanna make sure that you're okay.
translation.es: y solo queremos saber si estás bien.

translation.en: Okay.
There're these girls at school, Tiffany and Claire.
translation.es: Hay unas chicas en la escuela, Tiffany y Claire.

translation.en: They tweeted that I was a nerd just because I told Miss Perkins
translation.es: Ellas tuitearon que soy nerd por decirle a la señorita Perkins

translation.en: I had a passion for young adult literature.
translation.es: que me apasiona la literatura juvenil.

translation.en: That is very nerdy behavior.
[Marlon] Wait. Hold up.
You're being bullied?
But you go to an all-white private school.
translation.es: Pero vas a una escuela privada de blancos.

translation.en: What does that mean, Marlon?
She's black.
If this was Charlie Brown, she's Franklin.
translation.es: Si esto fuera Snoopy, ella sería Franklin.

translation.en: Black girls can't get bullied by little white girls.
translation.es: Las niñas negras no pueden ser acosadas por niñas blancas.

translation.en: Listen, white people are genetically predisposed
translation.es: Escucha, los blancos tienen una tendencia genética

translation.en: to fear black people.
-Marley... -Google it!
Okay.
Marley, just talk to the girls.
translation.es: Marley, solo habla con esas chicas.

translation.en: You tell them bullying is wrong.
What in The Brady Bunch are you talking about?
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de discurso de La tribu Brady es ese?

translation.en: No, Marley. Listen to Daddy, okay?
If them girls step to you, you just gotta act a little ghetto.
translation.es: Si esas chicas te molestan, actúa como marginal.

translation.en: [Marlon] You know what I'm saying?
If they come at you, you gotta be like, "Oh, hell no! Oh, hell no!
translation.es: Si te atacan, actúa así: "¡Diablos, no! ¡Diablos, no!

translation.en: I know you ain't! I know you ain't!
translation.es: ¡No están haciendo eso! ¡Sé que no lo hacen!

translation.en: This is what I wanted you to do!
translation.es: ¡Esto es lo que quería que hagan!

translation.en: This is what I wanted you to do!"
translation.es: ¡Esto es lo que quería que hagan!".

translation.en: Then you got to pull out your Vaseline,
start putting Vaseline on your face,
start braiding your hair just like you mean business.
translation.es: y trenzar tu cabello como si fueras a pelear.

translation.en: Then after that, I want you to go, "No, it's all peace. It's all peace.
translation.es: Luego, dices esto: "No, estamos en paz.

translation.en: It's all good. We good."
Then I just want you to walk away, and then you go,
"I lied, bitches! You're gonna get it!
You don't know me! I don't know me!
My momma doesn't know me, and I came out of her!"
translation.es: Ni siquiera mi mamá me conoce. ¡Y ella me parió!".

translation.en: Then I want you to get clapping on them,
"No, I told you, you better leave me alone!
translation.es: "¡Les dije que les convenía dejarme en paz!

translation.en: I am not the one!"
You do that, I guarantee you they're gonna take off running,
translation.es: Si haces eso, te garantizo que se irán corriendo

translation.en: and they're never gonna mess with you again, okay?
-Marley. -[Marley] Mm-hm?
Please ignore Daddy's advice.
translation.es: Por favor, ignora el consejo de tu padre.

translation.en: Baby girl, trust me.
If you "black up," they're going to back up.
translation.es: Si haces lo que dije, se irán.

translation.en: Now, let us pray.
[Stevie] Marlon.
Your cable's broken.
The only channel you're getting is the Oprah Winfrey Network.
translation.es: El único canal que funciona es Oprah Winfrey Network.

translation.en: If I have to watch another Tyler Perry movie,
translation.es: Si veo otra película de Tyler Perry,

translation.en: I may become a racist.
Stevie, you asked to crash on my couch for two weeks.
translation.es: Stevie, me preguntaste si podías dormir en mi sofá por dos semanas.

translation.en: Brother,
it's been two years!
Oh, is that all you remember about our past?
translation.es: ¿Eso es todo lo que recuerdas sobre el pasado?

translation.en: -Do you not recall that it was me, Stevie, -Oh, god.
translation.es: - ¿No recuerdas que fui yo quien te dijo - Dios mío.

translation.en: who told you to post your first video to YouTube?
translation.es: que publiques tu primer video en YouTube?

translation.en: Okay, okay, you might've been instrumental in the launching of my career.
translation.es: Está bien, tal vez hayas sido importante para lanzar mi carrera.

translation.en: "Instrumental?" "Instrumental."
I'm the wind beneath your wings, bitch.
translation.es: Soy el viento bajo tus alas, perra.

translation.en: "Bitch?"
I was using your misogynistic vernacular to drive home my point.
translation.es: Estaba usando tu lenguaje misógino para ilustrar mi punto.

translation.en: Well, let me drive home my point.
Get a job, bitch.
Marlon, if I may, you're being a bit more aggressive than usual.
translation.es: Marlon, si me lo permites, estás más agresivo de lo habitual.

translation.en: Is there anything you wanna share with me?
All right.
For the first time ever,
Ashley's bailing on family plans.
She would've loved Slaughter Camp.
I mean, the fun of watching a horror movie
translation.es: Lo bueno de ver una película de terror

translation.en: is watching her scream at the top of her lungs.
translation.es: Lo bueno de ver una película de terror es verla gritar fuerte.

translation.en: "Don't go in there!"
I love that!
That's frustrating.
You know what might make you feel better?
You moving your broke ass off my couch?
No, that's not what you want. [chuckles]
translation.es: No, eso no es lo que quieres.

translation.en: You wanna take me to Slaughter Camp instead.
translation.es: Quieres llevarme a mí a ver Slaughter Camp.

translation.en: I'll scream louder than Ashley.
Okay, deal.
But you gotta change your shirt first.
What's wrong with this shirt?
It's mine.
I guess I have to change my underwear, too.
Marlon, this is the fifth message that I have left for you.
translation.es: Marlon, ¡este es el quinto mensaje que te dejo!

translation.en: It's almost seven o'clock.
And I know any minute you are gonna walk in here,
translation.es: y sé que en cualquier momento entrarás aquí

translation.en: and you are gonna say...
I'm sorry I'm late,
but I have a really good excuse.
Really? What is it?
Uh, actually, I thought you'd say,
"I don't wanna hear no excuses."
So, I didn't come up with any.
That's what I thought. Okay, kids, time to go.
translation.es: Eso pensé. Bien, niños, hora de partir.

translation.en: -Hi, Stevie. Bye, Stevie. -Kids! Hey!
[Ashley] Have fun at Slaughter Camp!
Hey, you guys ready to see Uncle Stevie scream like a girl?
translation.es: ¿Están listos para ver a Stevie gritar como una niña?

translation.en: Hey, hey. Where you going?
So, Ashley's cool with you building forts in the middle of her house?
translation.es: ¿Ashley te deja construir fuertes en su casa?

translation.en: Dude, Ashley's cool with everything.
translation.es: Amigo, Ashley es genial en todo.

translation.en: If she's so cool, why don't you guys get back together?
translation.es: Si es tan genial vuelve con ella.

translation.en: No, we're better off separated.
Look, my life is perfect.
I get to do my things with the ladies,
I get to hang with Ashley and the kids,
translation.es: Paso tiempo con Ashley y los niños.

translation.en: I get to have my cake and eat it, too.
I wouldn't change a damn thing.
Hi.
I'm here to pick up Ashley.
Oh, hell no!
Hell no!
Hell no!
Hell to the no!
-Are you done? -Hell no.
I don't have time for this.
You know what? It's them shoes.
I should've known something was up when I've seen them shoes.
translation.es: Debí saber que pasaba algo al ver esos zapatos.

translation.en: See, those are ho shoes.
They're Yvette's.
Exactly.
You know, I can't believe you lied to me.
translation.es: No puedo creer que me mentiste.

translation.en: Liar.
You really wanna talk about lying in this relationship?
Oh, damn, woman.
Why you got to live in the past? Move on.
translation.es: ¿Por qué vives en el pasado? Ya déjalo.

translation.en: And you could've told me you were going on a date.
translation.es: Y podrías haberme dicho que tenías una cita.

translation.en: You know what? This is not easy for me, okay?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Esto no es fácil para mí.

translation.en: I haven't been on a date since 1998.
Who the hell did you go on a date with in 1998?
You, idiot!
You're the last person I was on a date with.
translation.es: Fuiste el último con quien salí.

translation.en: Was that the Dru Hill concert without Sisqó?
translation.es: ¿Fue el recital de Dru Hill sin Sisqó?

translation.en: Can we please be adults about this?
Adult? Wait, I'm being an adult, okay?
This... This is not about me.
translation.es: Esto no se trata de mí.

translation.en: This is about our children, okay?
This is about you wanting to go out with Sexy Simon,
translation.es: Esto es sobre tu deseo de salir con Simón sexi,

translation.en: instead of spending quality family time with your kids.
translation.es: en lugar de pasar tiempo con tus hijos.

translation.en: You know, this the type of stuff that makes 'em grow up to be strippers.
translation.es: Este tipo de cosa los convertirá en desnudistas.

translation.en: And I'm not talking about good strippers,
translation.es: Y no hablo de buenos desnudistas, sabes,

translation.en: you know, the flexible ones that know how to clap their booty.
translation.es: los flexibles, que aplauden con el trasero.

translation.en: I'm talking about the little lazy ones
that just stand by the pole, smacking their gum like,
translation.es: que se paran en el poste mascando chicle,

translation.en: "Hi, hi."
Do you want that for our son?
Seriously, Ash, seeing their mother with another man?
translation.es: En serio, Ash, ¿que vea a su madre con otro hombre?

translation.en: That could be traumatic for them.
That could lead to serious depression.
They really wanna show me the fort.
He doesn't even know the password.
translation.es: Él ni siquiera sabe la contraseña.

translation.en: This is a really beautiful restaurant, Devon.
translation.es: Este es un restaurante hermoso, Devon.

translation.en: -For a beautiful woman. -Thank you.
So your ex-husband, were you two together for a long time?
translation.es: Tu exesposo... ¿Estuvieron casados por mucho tiempo?

translation.en: We met in college.
Well, I was in college,
translation.es: Bueno, yo estaba en la universidad

translation.en: and he was pretending to go to college to meet girls.
translation.es: y él simulaba estudiar para conocer chicas.

translation.en: But, you know what? I really don't want to talk about my ex.
translation.es: Pero ¿sabes qué? No quiero hablar sobre él.

translation.en: Well, I'm afraid we might have to.
translation.es: Bueno, me temo que debemos hacerlo.

translation.en: Why is that?
Because he's here.
What the what?
That's crazy!
You know, I was out getting some frozen yogurt for the kids,
translation.es: Estaba comprándoles yogur helado a los niños,

translation.en: and I looked in the window, I said, "Hey! That looks like Ashley and David."
translation.es: y miré por la ventana y dije: "Oye, parecen Ashley y David".

translation.en: -It's Devon. -Is it?
Marlon, why aren't you at the movies?
translation.es: Marlon, ¿por qué no estás en el cine?

translation.en: You know, I really wasn't digging Slaughter Camp.
translation.es: Sabes, en verdad no me gustó la película.

translation.en: I couldn't feel sorry for those dumbass teenagers
translation.es: No tuve pena de esos idiotas adolescentes

translation.en: partying in the woods.
You know, at a point, I just started rooting for the killer.
translation.es: En cierto punto me puse del lado del asesino.

translation.en: Well, it was nice to see you.
-Okay, I'm sorry. -Yeah.
-I'mma jet. -Okay.
-Yes. -You guys get back to your little date.
translation.es: - Sí. - Vuelvan a su pequeña cita.

translation.en: -Hey, good seeing you, Dennis. -Devon.
-I'm so sorry. -I've already forgotten about him.
translation.es: - Lo siento mucho. - Ya lo olvidé.

translation.en: So Yvette tells me you're a great designer.
translation.es: Yvette dice que eres una gran diseñadora.

translation.en: -I would love to hear more... -Real quick.
While I'm here, I should tell you about the trash cans.
translation.es: Ya que estoy aquí quisiera contarles sobre la basura.

translation.en: I got a letter from the city.
They are gonna start picking up the trash cans on Thursdays
translation.es: Van a empezar a recoger la basura los jueves

translation.en: -instead of Tuesdays, so... -Well, you know what?
translation.es: y no los miércoles... Bueno, ¿sabes qué? Creo que podemos hablar sobre eso después.

translation.en: I'm sure that we can talk about this later.
translation.es: Bueno, ¿sabes qué? Creo que podemos hablar sobre eso después.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, and I... And I hear you, but you know,
you just don't wanna leave garbage cans out.
translation.es: no quieres dejar la basura fuera, ¿no?

translation.en: God forbid, one of our kids get mauled by a bear!
translation.es: Dios no permita que nuestros hijos sean masacrados por un oso.

translation.en: I saw The Revenant,
and bear gonna do that to Leonardo DiCaprio,
translation.es: y si un oso le hace eso a DiCaprio,

translation.en: imagine what it's gonna do to our son's little black ass.
translation.es: imagina lo que le hará a nuestro hijo.

translation.en: [Marlon] But, your date is more important than him,
translation.es: Pero tu cita es más importante

translation.en: the potential death of our son.
translation.es: que la muerte de nuestro hijo.

translation.en: -Give us a second, Jeff. -It's Devon.
[Ashley] Marlon,
why are you here?
Because I did some research on the Internet,
and I dug up some dirt on your boy Devon over there.
translation.es: y descubrí algunas cosas sobre tu chico, Devon.

translation.en: -What did you find out, Marlon? -Well, I'm glad you asked.
translation.es: - ¿Qué descubriste, Marlon? - Bueno, me alegra que preguntes.

translation.en: In spite of his pretty face and those almond-shaped eyes,
translation.es: A pesar de su cara bonita y sus ojos que parecen almendras,

translation.en: his Equifax history shows a delinquent payment
translation.es: su historial muestra un pago atrasado

translation.en: to the gas company in June of 2003.
translation.es: su historial muestra un pago atrasado a la compañía de gas en junio de 2003.

translation.en: [Ashley] What?
It starts with one late payment, then it's a slippery slope from there.
translation.es: Empieza con un pago atrasado y de ahí en adelante va en caída.

translation.en: Is there a problem?
No, it ain't no problem, brother.
Unless you're the gas company, and people try to take advantage of you.
translation.es: A menos que seas la compañía de gas y alguien intente aprovecharse de ti.

translation.en: Pardon me, sir, but I'm gonna have to ask you to leave.
translation.es: Disculpe, señor, pero debo pedirle que se retire.

translation.en: You're not dining with us this evening, and you're clearly disrupting our guests.
translation.es: No está cenando aquí esta noche y claramente incomoda a los clientes.

translation.en: Oh, really? Is that the reason?
Or is it because I'm black?
[manager] No! God, no.
He's black, and we're not asking him to leave.
translation.es: Él es negro y no le pedimos que se vaya.

translation.en: Oh, wait! Oh, you're gonna call your boys...
translation.es: ¡Espera! Vas a llamar a tu chico...

translation.en: You're going to call your boys on me?
Ya'll going to make me act ghetto!
This is what I wanted you to do! Oh! [camera clicks]
So you better ask yourself real fast, do you really wanna do this?
translation.es: Más les vale preguntarse si esto es lo que quieren.

What happened tonight, Marlon?
Look, I don't know.

Over one date?
You've been on hundreds of dates since we separated.

your daughter Marley said some things in the cafeteria this afternoon

She paraded around the cafeteria clapping her hands,
and threatening Tiffany and Claire,
